articles.author: Walé Azeez, CNN Business
articles.title: Facebook to hire 10,000 people in EU to build the 'metaverse' - CNN
articles.description: Facebook plans to hire up to 10,000 workers in Europe to build a "metaverse" that will combine virtual and augmented reality technologies in a new online realm.

articles.author: Jon Stone
articles.title: British demands to strip EU judges of power over Northern Ireland ‘not on table’ in talks - The Independent
articles.description: EU hints discussions will not include European Court of Justice
articles.content:
British demands to strip EU judges of power over Northern Ireland are not on the table in Brexit talks, Brussels has indicated.

articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: Brussels hints talks won’t include stripping EU judges from Northern Ireland Protocol - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: The EU said a ‘very intense period of discussions’ has begun but suggested they may not include the role of the European Court of Justice.
articles.content:
BRUSSELS HAS SIGNALLED it is unwilling to cave to UK demands to discuss removing oversight by European judges from the Northern Ireland Protocol as post-Brexit negotiations continue.
